recipesJson.name: Simple Berries and Yogurt
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description: This recipe is from Ejuice for Beginners DIY Made Easy Ep. 003: 3 Simple 3 Ingredient Recipes watch the video on YouTube at https://youtu.be/P042DD45NHo

reviews.text: Great simple mix. Love what your doin' with your DIY Made Easy series. This is a cheap, easy recipe that is also delicious and proves that anyone with 5 extra minutes can make their own liquid for cents compared to dollars. Awesome job.
